entry.title: Exploring Socio-technical Security Concerns in Critical Opensource Python Repositories
entry.summary:
Description

"Exploring Socio-technical Security Concerns in Critical Open-source Python Repositories" Speaker: Jessy Ayala. Looking at open-source security concerns from a socio-technical perspective is currently underexplored. In this talk, we will learn about analyzing such risks by looking at governance structures, pull requests, and GitHub configurations in open-source 3D printer projects â€¦
entry.content:
Description

"Exploring Socio-technical Security Concerns in Critical Open-source Python Repositories" Speaker: Jessy Ayala. Looking at open-source security concerns from a socio-technical perspective is currently underexplored. In this talk, we will learn about analyzing such risks by looking at governance structures, pull requests, and GitHub configurations in open-source 3D printer projects and the overall top Python repositories. PyTexas 2023
